def_cn: 海啸;潮波;异常高的潮位
def_en: A tidal wave is a very large wave, often caused by an earthquake, that flows onto the land and destroys things.

def_cn: (感情、事物或人出现的)高潮期
def_en: If you describe a very large number of emotions, things, or people as a tidal wave, you mean that they all occur at the same time.
